name: Vanilla Cake
description: Classic vanilla cake with soft, fluffy layers and rich buttercream frosting. Perfect for all celebrations.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake layered with smooth chocolate ganache. A chocolate lover's dream.

name: Marble Cake
description: Beautiful swirl of vanilla and chocolate in every slice. Best of both worlds in one cake.

name: Tutti Frutti Cake
description: Colorful and delightful cake studded with tutti frutti gems. A festive treat for all ages.

name: Butterscotch Cake
description: Indulgent butterscotch flavored cake with crunchy caramel bits. Sweet, rich and irresistible.

name: Vanilla Cupcakes
description: Perfectly portioned vanilla cupcakes topped with swirled buttercream. Ideal for parties and gifting.

name: Chocolate Cupcakes
description: Rich chocolate cupcakes with chocolate frosting and sprinkles. Mini indulgence in every bite.

name: Marble Cupcakes
description: Cute cupcakes with vanilla-chocolate marble swirl. Perfect blend of two classic flavors.

name: Tutti Frutti Cupcakes
description: Colorful cupcakes loaded with tutti frutti bits. Fun and festive for every celebration.

name: Butterscotch Cupcakes
description: Delightful butterscotch cupcakes with caramel drizzle. Sweet luxury in cupcake form.

name: Gluten-Free Vanilla Cake
description: Classic vanilla cake made entirely gluten-free. Same great taste, healthier choice.

name: Gluten-Free Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake without the gluten. Decadent, healthy, and absolutely delicious.

name: Multi-Millet Health Mix
description: Traditional nutrition blend with 7 ancient millets, slow-processed to retain nutrition.

name: Ragi Malt Powder
description: Pure finger millet powder packed with calcium and iron. Perfect for all ages.

name: Traditional Sathu Maavu
description: Authentic multi-grain health mix based on age-old South Indian recipe.

name: Jowar Flour (Sorghum)
description: Premium quality jowar flour, gluten-free and perfect for rotis and baking.

name: Gluten-Free Pizza Base
description: Ready-to-use pizza base that tastes just like regular pizza - but healthier!

name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
description: Rich, decadent chocolate cake with layers of moist sponge and smooth chocolate frosting. Perfect for celebrations.

name: Classic Vanilla Cake
description: Light and airy vanilla sponge with creamy vanilla buttercream. A timeless favorite for any occasion.

name: Banana Walnut Cake
description: Naturally sweetened with ripe bananas, topped with crunchy walnuts. Wholesome and delicious.

name: Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting
description: Spiced carrot cake loaded with fresh carrots, topped with tangy cream cheese frosting.

name: Assorted Cookie Box
description: A delightful variety of handcrafted cookies - chocolate chip, oatmeal, almond, and more in one box.

name: Complete Health Powder Mix
description: All-in-one nutritional powerhouse combining the best of traditional grains, nuts, and seeds for complete wellness.
